expo.name: Civic Vigilance
expo.description: Report civic issues. Amplify your voice. Hold authorities accountable. CivicVigilance empowers citizens to report potholes, garbage, broken infrastructure and more with photos, GPS tagging, and social media amplification.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: CivicVigilance needs camera access to capture civic issues.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: CivicVigilance uses your location to tag reports accurately.
